name: Metablox: Education Module
description:
Metablox exists as part of a future where the vast majority of our human interactions are mediated by the metaverse. It’s a world that’s made for teens for both the purposes of education and socialization. In it, teens can access the different worlds of the metaverse with ease.

The color palette we’ve chosen is a brightly colored one that’s normally associated with topics like school. We’ve also drawn inspiration from surrealist artist Paul Klee, as his work showcases bright colors and more geometric shapes and configurations.

Energetic Drink by LesFM | https://lesfm.net/energetic-background-music/

Music promoted by https://www.chosic.com/free-music/all/
